title: Person of Interest REACTION & REVIEW - 1x15 "Blue Code"
author: Jimmy Macram
comment: Believe me, man, this is just the start of Fusco's greatness.
Even if you end up liking another character more, Fusco is still a great character.  I just watched that actor fight Pilgrim as I rewatch season 2 of the Punisher.
Fantastic episode, great reaction. This show is a fave of mine, and everybody I've recommended it to loves it to bits.
Fun fact - the CIA trafficking drugs thing? That's based on real world stuff. A lot of cool worldbuilding in this show hits quite close to reality.
